#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define REP(i,a,b) for(int i=a;i<b;i++)
#define rep(i,n) REP(i,0,n)

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned ll
#define N 100009

vector<int> sum[27],ind[27];
int win[N];
char inp[N][2];

int main()
{
    #ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
    #endif // ONLINE_JUDGE
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
        {
            sum[i].clear();
            ind[i].clear();
        }
        for(int i=0;i<N;i++)
        {
            win[i]=0;
        }
        int n,k;
        scanf("%d %d",&n,&k);
        char str[20];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            scanf("%s",str);
            char a,b;
            a = str[0];
            b = str[strlen(str)-1];
            inp[i][0]=a;
            inp[i][1]=b;
            ind[a-'a'].push_back(i);
        }
        for(int i=0;i<26;i++)
        sum[i] = vector<int> (ind[i].size()+2,0);

        for(int i=n-1;i>=0;i--)
        {
            char st,ed;
            st = inp[i][0];
            ed = inp[i][1];
            int ind1 = upper_bound(ind[ed-'a'].begin(),ind[ed-'a'].end(),i)-ind[ed-'a'].begin();
            int ind2 = upper_bound(ind[ed-'a'].begin(),ind[ed-'a'].end(),i+k)-ind[ed-'a'].begin();
            int w = sum[ed-'a'][ind2]-sum[ed-'a'][ind1];
            int ind3 = lower_bound(ind[st-'a'].begin(),ind[st-'a'].end(),i)-ind[st-'a'].begin();
            if(w==0)
            {
                win[i]=1;
                sum[st-'a'][ind3] = 1+ sum[st-'a'][ind3+1];
            }
            else
            {
                win[i]=0;
                sum[st-'a'][ind3] = sum[st-'a'][ind3+1];
            }
        }
        bool flag = false;
        for(int i=0;i<k;i++)
        if(win[i]==1)
        {
            flag = true;
            break;
        }
        if(flag)
        printf("Alex\n");
        else
        printf("Bob\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
